statements: SELECT * FROM energy_usage;
SELECT id, timestamp, appliance, energy_consumed, voice_command FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT appliance, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM energy_usage GROUP BY appliance ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT id, appliance, voice_command FROM energy_usage WHERE voice_command IS NOT NULL AND appliance LIKE 'microwave%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT appliance, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59' GROUP BY appliance ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE appliance = 'Refrigerator' OR appliance = 'Air Conditioner' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT DISTINCT voice_command FROM energy_usage ORDER BY voice_command ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumption FROM energy_usage WHERE id = 5;
SELECT command_text FROM voice_commands WHERE device_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, energy_consumption FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY id ASC, device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_commands FROM voice_commands GROUP BY device_id HAVING num_commands > 10;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_energy FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_commands FROM voice_commands GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_commands > 5;
SELECT e.*, v.command_text FROM energy_usage e INNER JOIN voice_commands v ON e.device_id = v.device_id WHERE e.timestamp < NOW();
SELECT MAX(energy_consumption) AS max_energy FROM energy_usage;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE device_id = 123456;
SELECT id, command_text FROM voice_commands ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM efficiency_optimization GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_usage GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT id, command_text, command_type, DATE_FORMAT(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM voice_commands WHERE command_text LIKE '%on%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM efficiency_optimization WHERE optimization_type = 'Eco Mode' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_optimizations FROM efficiency_optimization GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_optimizations >= 3 ORDER BY total_optimizations DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 50;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM SmartHomeDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT command, timestamp FROM VoiceCommands WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_name, power_consumption FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Plug';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VoiceCommands WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT device_name, power_consumption FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_type = 'lighting' OR device_type = 'heating';
SELECT * FROM OptimizedEnergySchedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND end_time < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsers;
SELECT username, email FROM EnergyUsers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDevices ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT device_name, energy_consumption FROM EnergyDevices WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT command, timestamp FROM VoiceCommands WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsers ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT username, email FROM EnergyUsers WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC;

SELECT eu.username, ed.device_name, ec.command FROM EnergyUsers eu JOIN EnergyDevices ed ON eu.id = ed.user_id JOIN VoiceCommands ec ON ed.device_id = ec.device_id WHERE ec.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY ec.timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyDevices GROUP BY device_name HAVING total_consumption > 500;

SELECT up.user_id, ed.device_name, es.efficiency_factor FROM UserPreferences up JOIN EnergyDevices ed ON up.preferred_device_id = ed.device_id JOIN EfficiencyStatistics es ON ed.device_id = es.device_id WHERE es.timestamp > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY up.user_id ASC, es.efficiency_factor DESC;
